Messages.Accept: {player} has accepted your teleport request! Teleporting in {countdown} seconds!
Messages.AcceptOnRoof: You can't accept a teleport while you're on a ceiling, get to ground level!
Messages.AcceptTarget: You've accepted the teleport request of {player}!
Messages.AdminTPBack: You've teleported back to your previous location!
Messages.AdminTPBackSave: Your previous location has been saved, use /tpb to teleport back!
Messages.AdminTPBoundaries: X and Z values need to be between -{boundary} and {boundary} while the Y value needs to be between -100 and 2000!
Messages.AdminTPLocationSave: You have saved the current location!
Messages.AdminTPOutOfBounds: You tried to teleport to a set of coordinates outside the map boundaries!
Messages.CantTeleportPlayerToSelf: You can't teleport a player to himself!
Messages.HomeExists: You have already saved a home location by this name!
Messages.HomeExistsNearby: A home location with the name {name} already exists near this position!
Messages.HomeFoundationNotFriendsOwned: You need to be in your own or in a friend's house to set your home!
Messages.HomeFoundationNotOwned: You can't set your home on someone else's house.
Messages.HomeMaxLocations: Unable to set your home here, you have reached the maximum of {amount} homes!
Messages.HomeNotFound: Couldn't find your home with that name!
Messages.HomeSave: You have saved the current location as your home!
Messages.HomeSaveFoundationOnly: You can only save a home location on a foundation!
Messages.HomesListWiped: You have wiped all the saved home locations!
Messages.HomeTPCooldown: Your teleport is currently on cooldown. You'll have to wait {time} for your next teleport.
Messages.HomeTPLimitReached: You have reached the daily limit of {limit} teleports today!
Messages.HomeTPStarted: Teleporting to your home {home} in {countdown} seconds!
Messages.InvalidCharacter: You have used an invalid character, please limit yourself to the letters a to z and numbers.
Messages.InvalidCoordinates: The coordinates you've entered are invalid!
Messages.LocationExists: A location with this name already exists at {location}!
Messages.LocationExistsNearby: A location with the name {name} already exists near this position!
Messages.LocationNotFound: Couldn't find a location with that name!
Messages.MultiplePlayersFound: Found multiple players with that name!
Messages.NoPendingRequest: You have no pending teleport request!
Messages.PendingRequest: You already have a request pending, cancel that request or wait until it gets accepted or times out!
Messages.PendingRequestTarget: The player you wish to teleport to already has a pending request, try again later!
Messages.PlayerNotFound: The specified player couldn't be found please try again!
Messages.RequestTarget: {player} requested to be teleported to you! Use '/tpa' to accept!
SyntaxCommandHome: You can only use the /home command as follows:
/home <home name> - Teleports yourself to your home with the name 'home name'.
SyntaxCommandListHomes: You can only use the /listhomes command as follows:
/listhomes - Shows you a list of all your saved home locations.
SyntaxCommandRemoveHome: You can only use the /removehome command as follows:
/removehome <home name> - Removes the home location with the name 'location name'.
SyntaxCommandSetHome: You can only use the /sethome command as follows:
/sethome <home name> - Saves the current location as your home with the name 'home name'.
SyntaxCommandTP: You can only use the /tp command as follows:
/tp <targetplayer> - Teleports yourself to the target player.
/tp <player> <targetplayer> - Teleports the player to the target player.
/tp <x> <y> <z> - Teleports you to the set of coordinates.
/tp <player> <x> <y> <z> - Teleports the player to the set of coordinates.
SyntaxCommandTPA: You can only use the /tpa command as follows:
SyntaxCommandTPL: You can only use the /tpl command as follows:
/tpl - Shows a list of saved locations.
/tpl <location name> - Teleports you to a saved location.
SyntaxCommandTPN: You can only use the /tpn command as follows:
/tpn <targetplayer> - Teleports yourself the default distance behind the target player.
/tpn <targetplayer> <distance> - Teleports you the specified distance behind the target player.
SyntaxCommandTPR: You can only use the /tpr command as follows:
/tpr <player name> - Sends out a teleport request to 'player name'.
SyntaxCommandTPRemove: You can only use the /tpremove command as follows:
/tpremove <location name> - Removes the location with the name 'location name'.
SyntaxCommandTPSave: You can only use the /tpsave command as follows:
/tpsave <location name> - Saves your current position as 'location name'.
SyntaxConsoleCommandToPlayer: You can only use the teleport.toplayer console command as follows:
SyntaxConsoleCommandToPos: You can only use the teleport.topos console command as follows:
Messages.TargetDisconnected: {player} has disconnected, your teleport was cancelled!
Messages.TeleportPending: You can't initiate another teleport while you have a teleport pending!
Messages.TeleportPendingTarget: You can't request a teleport to someone who's about to teleport!
Messages.TimedOut: {player} did not answer your request in time!
Messages.TimedOutTarget: You did not answer {player}'s teleport request in time!

admintp: As an admin you have access to the following commands:
/tp <targetplayer> - Teleports yourself to the target player.
/tp <player> <targetplayer> - Teleports the player to the target player.
/tp <x> <y> <z> - Teleports you to the set of coordinates.
/tpl - Shows a list of saved locations.
/tpl <location name> - Teleports you to a saved location.
/tpsave <location name> - Saves your current position as the location name.
/tpremove <location name> - Removes the location from your saved list.
/tpb - Teleports you back to the place where you were before teleporting.
General: Please specify the module you want to view the help of.
home: With the following commands you can set your home location to teleport back to:
/sethome <home name> - Saves your current position as the location name.
/listhomes - Shows you a list of all the locations you have saved.
/removehome <home name> - Removes the location of your saved homes.
/home <home name> - Teleports you to the home location.
tpr: With these commands you can request to be teleported to a player or accept someone else's request:
/tpr <player name> - Sends a teleport request to the player.

Messages.TPRCooldown: Your teleport requests are currently on cooldown. You'll have to wait {time} to send your next teleport request.
Messages.TPRLimitReached: You have reached the daily limit of {limit} teleport requests today!

General: Please specify the module you want to view the settings of.
home: Home System as the current settings enabled:
tpr: TPR System as the current settings enabled:
